entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Goderich
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:38 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Goderich 2:00 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023
Temperature: -7.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -12.8°C
Wind: WNW 26 km/h gust 41 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Local blowing snow early this afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight with a few flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023
